translation.en: [woman] Things need to change and change now.
translation.zh: 现况需要改变 而且必须马上改变

translation.en: [man] Which is why we are staging a protest at the Democratic National Convention.
translation.zh:
所以我们才决定
在民主党全国大会期间举行示威游行

translation.en: [man 2] And the Republicans are any better?
translation.zh: 难道共和党比民主党更好吗？

translation.en: -We plan on challenging them as well. -[distant phone ringing]
translation.zh: 我们也有改变共和党的计划

translation.en: So you want me to lead 5,000 Negroes into Los Angeles
translation.zh:
你要我率领五千位非裔同胞
前往洛杉矶

translation.en: and disrupt the Democratic Convention?
translation.zh: 干涉民主党大会？

translation.en: I'm sorry. I'm not your man.
translation.zh: 不好意思 你们找错人了

translation.en: Who told you you are not our man?
translation.zh: 谁说我们找错人了？

translation.en: Were you not our man
translation.zh: 我们怎么会找错人了呢？

translation.en: when you took command of the Montgomery bus boycott
translation.zh:
当初你率领同胞们
参与蒙哥马利公车抵制运动

translation.en: or spoke with such eloquence the night your home was bombed?
translation.zh:
那晚你家被炸毁后
你还发表了铿锵有力的演说

translation.en: You're conveniently forgetting I'm now co-pastor of Ebenezer.
translation.zh:
你刻意没提到我目前也是
埃比尼泽浸信会教堂协理牧师

translation.en: When C.L. first heard you speak, he rang me and said,
translation.zh:
克拉伦斯·拉沃恩第一次听你演说后
他打给我说

translation.en: "Bayard, there's magic going on down here."
translation.zh: “贝亚德 这里出现奇迹了”

translation.en: You know what he saw? A star.
translation.zh:
你知道他看见了什么吗？
一个明日之星

translation.en: And when that star starts to shine brighter than any other,
translation.zh:
可是一旦这位明日之星的光芒
比其他人更耀眼时

translation.en: including the most powerful Negro leaders that came before,
translation.zh:
比其他更早出道的权威非裔领袖
更耀眼时

translation.en: they will do everything in their power to extinguish your light and put you in your place.
translation.zh:
政府就会竭尽所能去熄灭这道光芒
确保你乖乖待在原地

translation.en: Mrs. Ella Baker, I have received a number of calls
translation.zh: 艾拉·贝克女士 我接到好几通电话

translation.en: from prominent men within the movement who see no wisdom in these protests.
translation.zh:
来电者均为非裔民权运动的名人
他们都认为这些示威行动没有意义

translation.en: Men with whom I share a strong kinship.
translation.zh: 他们都是我的知己挚友

translation.en: Not once you leave the room.
translation.zh:
一旦你走出这里
他们就不是你的知己挚友了

translation.en: [softly] Friend, one of my greatest joys is watching you rise.
translation.zh: 老兄 看着你崛起是我人生一大喜乐

translation.en: We need you to lead us into Los Angeles,
translation.zh: 我们需要你带领我们行进洛杉矶

translation.en: where we will most vigorously let Kennedy and the entire Democratic Party know
translation.zh:
用最强烈的态度
让肯尼迪和整个民主党知道

translation.en: that unless they show up for our people,
translation.zh: 除非他们为同胞们挺身而出

translation.en: take a stand against segregation, our people will not show up for them.
translation.zh:
对抗种族隔离制度
否则我们绝不会支持他们

translation.en: -Hear! Hear! -Yes! Yes! Yes!
translation.zh:
-说得好！
-很好！

translation.en: [Bayard] Do this, Martin.
translation.zh: 加入吧 马丁

translation.en: Own your power.
translation.zh: 接纳你的影响力

translation.en: I am pleased to announce
translation.zh: 我很荣幸地宣布

translation.en: that my friend, Dr. Martin Luther King, will be joining us in Los Angeles.
translation.zh: 我的兄弟马丁·路德·金博士

translation.en: -Yes! -Yes!
translation.zh:
-太好了
-太好了

translation.en: I'm telling you, the best grits ever.
translation.zh: 听好 这是最美味的玉米粥

translation.en: Lest I remind you, I was born and raised in Georgia. My mother was--
translation.zh:
别说我没提醒你
我可是在佐治亚州长大的 我妈以前…

translation.en: Try them.
translation.zh: 尝过再说

translation.en: -How's my beloved Coretta? -Fine.
translation.zh:
-我亲爱的科丽塔近来可好？
-很好

translation.en: -And the kids? -Missing you.
translation.zh:
-孩子们都好吗？
-他们都很想你

translation.en: Every time I step through that house, "How's Uncle Bayard?"
translation.zh:
每次踏入家门
他们都问：“贝亚德叔叔好吗？”

translation.en: -Aw. [chuckles] -"Where's Uncle Bayard?"
translation.zh: “贝亚德叔叔在哪里？”

translation.en: And those self-appointed noble Negroes of the NAACP?
translation.zh:
全国有色人种协进会中
那些自诩为“非裔贵族”想不想我？

translation.en: Roy.
translation.zh: 像罗伊

translation.en: Powell.
translation.zh: 鲍威尔

translation.en: I can't wait to hear what they have to say about us making a move on LA.
translation.zh:
我好想知道他们得知
我们要去洛杉矶示威后会怎么说

translation.en: My convention, my party.
translation.zh: 这是我参与的大会、我所属的党

translation.en: I've spent the past 15 years fighting Dixiecrats in Congress,
translation.zh:
过去15年以来
我一直致力于对抗州权民主党

translation.en: going after and winning on everything from poll taxes
translation.zh: 卯足全力去争取废除人头税

translation.en: to the right to piss in the goddamn Congressional commode.
translation.zh:
以及在国会大厦的烂厕所里
尿尿的权力

translation.en: How dare his Black ass take aim without first coming to me?
translation.zh:
这臭黑鬼竟敢
在未经我同意下采取行动？真大胆

translation.en: [man] Had King reached out, would you have said yes?
translation.zh: 如果金真来问你 你会答应吗？

translation.en: Hell, no. That fighting son of a bitch needs to keep down South where he belongs.
translation.zh:
当然不会 那个争强斗狠的家伙
必须待在南部 那才是属于他的地方

translation.en: I blame Rustin.
translation.zh: 要怪只能怪鲁斯汀

translation.en: Ever since the Montgomery bus boycott, he's got King thinking he's the second coming.
translation.zh:
自公车抵制运动后
金就将他视为耶稣再世

translation.en: The hell with Bayard Rustin.
translation.zh: 贝亚德·鲁斯汀也真是的

translation.en: His attention-grabbing antics are the exact opposite
translation.zh: 他招摇过市的反叛作风

translation.en: of how policy is altered and laws are changed.
translation.zh:
与诉求政策和法律改革的应有手段
背道而驰

translation.en: [softly] And let's not mention the unmentionable.
translation.zh: 更不用说那件不能提的丑闻了

translation.en: [Powell] No.
translation.zh: 不行

translation.en: I say, say it.
translation.zh: 我认为我们不能不说

translation.en: Say it, I say, and say it loud!
translation.zh:
我认为这事要说出来
而且要大声说出来

translation.en: Listen to me.
translation.zh: 你听我说

translation.en: I am phoning the good reverend doctor's office today.
translation.zh:
我今天会打去
那位博士兼牧师的办事处

translation.en: If they don't call this shit off,
translation.zh: 如果他们不喊停

translation.en: the world will know the truth about Martin Luther King and his queen.
translation.zh:
全世界都会知道
马丁·路德·金和他那位“宠儿”的事

translation.en: And, baby, I do not mean Coretta.
translation.zh: 亲 我指的“宠儿”可不是科丽塔

translation.en: Congressman Powell has done so much for Harlem.
translation.zh: 鲍威尔参议员为哈林区贡献良多

translation.en: Almost as much as he's done for himself.
translation.zh: （美国非裔工会领导人） 当然他也为自己贡献良多

translation.en: But this is a bold-faced lie, and he knows it.
translation.zh: 但这传闻明摆着是假的 他也很清楚

translation.en: [man] I have to tell Martin. I have--
translation.zh: 我必须告诉马丁 我必须…

translation.en: Yes, I'm well aware of the fact that Martin is your boss as well as your friend,
translation.zh:
我很清楚马丁是你的老大
也是你的朋友

translation.en: but at least let me speak with Bayard first,
translation.zh: 起码先让我跟贝亚德说一声

translation.en: as this is certain to disorder his soul most of all!
translation.zh:
毕竟这消息
将对他的心灵造成很大的冲击

translation.en: Me and Martin?
translation.zh: 我和马丁？

translation.en: [scoffs] No, no, no, no, no, no, no.
translation.zh: 不可能

translation.en: Brothers, yes.
translation.zh: 我们是好兄弟

translation.en: Besides, he's not my type.
translation.zh: 更何况 他不是我的菜

translation.en: [Randolph] Making threats, talking about going to the white print--
translation.zh:
出言威胁
说要给白人经营的报社通风报信

translation.en: Chief, Chief, you call it trouble. I call it an opportunity.
translation.zh: 头儿 你认为是麻烦 我倒认为是机会

translation.en: In response to Powell's reckless accusations,
translation.zh: 为了回应鲍威尔毫无根据的指责

translation.en: I'll write a letter tendering my resignation.
translation.zh: 我会写一封辞职信

translation.en: When Martin rejects it, we will have forced him to see
translation.zh:
只要马丁挽留我
我们就能让他意识到

translation.en: who wishes him well and who does not.
translation.zh: 谁支持他 谁希望他垮台

translation.en: -[Randolph] What makes you so sure? -Hm.
translation.zh: 你凭什么这么肯定？

translation.en: -Be-- Because I know Martin, sir. -[Randolph] Bayard?
translation.zh: 因为我很了解马丁 头儿

translation.en: -Sir. -[Randolph] You may know Martin, but--
translation.zh:
-贝亚德
-头儿 -虽然你很了解马丁 但是你并不…
-不会有事的

translation.en: -All will be fine. -[music stops abruptly]
translation.zh:
-虽然你很了解马丁 但是你并不…
-不会有事的

translation.en: I assumed it would just be the two of us.
translation.zh: 我以为只有我们俩

translation.en: We thank you for your many years of service.
translation.zh: 我们感谢你多年来的服务

translation.en: -[stamping] -[paper rustling]
translation.zh:
（1963年） （解放之路
没有通往和平的路 和平就是道路）

translation.en: -[metal clanking] -[stamping]
translation.zh:
（解放之路
没有通往和平的路 和平就是道路）

translation.en: -[phone clicks] -[woman] War Resisters League.
translation.zh: 这里是反战联盟

translation.en: Excuse me.
translation.zh: 借过

translation.en: -Hey! My brother. -[man] Blyden.
translation.zh:
-嗨 老兄
-布莱登

translation.en: -Hey! -Hey!
translation.zh:
-嗨
-嗨

translation.en: -What's up, man? -[man] What's up, man? Looking good.
translation.zh:
-老兄 最近好吗？
-老兄 好吗？看起来很精神嘛

translation.en: Good Lordy, Miss Claudia.
translation.zh: 天啊 是克劳迪娅小姐

translation.en: Goodness. I'm just gonna squeeze right through here. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 天啊 我就从这里挤过去吧

translation.en: I tell you, man, I go south again,
translation.zh: 听好 这次回南方

translation.en: it's gonna be with a gun in my hand and Brother Malcolm in my heart.
translation.zh:
我会手持一把枪
怀抱着马尔科姆兄的信念

translation.en: Right.
translation.zh: 说得好

translation.en: Hey! What's up, man?
translation.zh: 嗨 老兄 最近好吗？

translation.en: [woman] Bayard. Bayard.
translation.zh: 贝亚德

translation.en: Bayard.
translation.zh: 贝亚德

translation.en: "For ne'er I saw a true beauty till this night."
translation.zh: “从未见过如此绝世美人”

translation.en: Are you talking to the vodka or me?
translation.zh: 你这是喝多了还是真心话？

translation.en: I take it there was some sort of protest?
translation.zh: 他们是不是刚从抗议活动回来？

translation.en: Uh, it kinda got derailed, so we invited everyone back here.
translation.zh:
刚刚那场抗议活动有点失控
于是我们把所有人叫回这里

translation.en: NAACP!
translation.zh: 全国有色人种协进会！

translation.en: -Yeah! -[man] Nice.
translation.zh:
-说得好
-不错嘛

translation.en: Obscure fact about Miss Ella Baker,
translation.zh:
跟你说说
学生非暴力协委会的大人物

translation.en: early champion of SNCC.
translation.zh: 艾拉·贝克一件鲜为人知的事

translation.en: She's Al Capone when it comes to cards.
translation.zh: 她可是“牌后”

translation.en: Tonk, Bid Whist, Crazy Eights. [laughs]
translation.zh:
坦克、惠斯特叫牌、疯狂八八
都难不倒她

translation.en: You're marvelous and have absolutely no idea who I am.
translation.zh: 你很了不起 却不认识我是谁

translation.en: Like you know what I know?
translation.zh: 说得好像你是我肚里的蛔虫似的

translation.en: [softly] Ice.
translation.zh: 少了冰块

translation.en: Uh, who is that?
translation.zh: 他是谁啊？

translation.en: Doors barricaded…
translation.zh: 门被堵住

translation.en: tires slashed.
translation.zh: 轮胎被划破

translation.en: No escape.
translation.zh: 无路可逃

translation.en: Firebombs thrown inside.
translation.zh: 有人将燃烧弹扔进来

translation.en: Folks started screamin'.
translation.zh: 同胞们开始尖叫

translation.en: I finally get out.
translation.zh: 我终于逃出来

translation.en: I'm on the ground.
translation.zh: 摔到地上

translation.en: This white man…
translation.zh: 有个白人男子

translation.en: takes this pipe
translation.zh: 拿起一根管子

translation.en: and hits me…
translation.zh: 打我

translation.en: over and over.
translation.zh: 不停地打

translation.en: I'm so sorry.
translation.zh: 抱歉 真为你难过

translation.en: Like we give a shit you sorry.
translation.zh: 道歉有什么用？

translation.en: It's probably one of your uncles or cousins with that pipe.
translation.zh:
那个手持管子的人
搞不好是你的叔叔或亲戚

translation.en: -I was raised in Brooklyn. -Listening to this shit?
translation.zh:
-我在布鲁克林区长大
-听到他的废话了吗？

translation.en: -Why would I have cousins in Alabama? -White boy talking shit.
translation.zh:
-怎么会有亲戚住在阿拉巴马州？
-白人小子说得都是废话

translation.en: Tom isn't like that.
translation.zh: 汤姆不是那种人

translation.en: Bet you these two are card-carrying members of Martin-de-Lawd's nonviolence jamboree.
translation.zh:
我敢打赌你们俩
是“小马哥”非暴力反抗运动的支持者

translation.en: So let's play. I'll be the redneck.
translation.zh: 我们来玩个游戏吧 我扮演南方白人

translation.en: Beat you so bad your body starts to scream.
translation.zh:
把你打到头破血流
打到身体开始叫嚣

translation.en: Beat you like they beat Tyrone.
translation.zh: 就像他们当初怎么暴打泰隆那样

translation.en: Beat you till you're calling for your mama.
translation.zh: 打到你喊妈妈

translation.en: Whoa, hey!
translation.zh: 天啊 住手！

translation.en: I'm the one that's been preaching passive resistance since before you were born.
translation.zh:
我在你还没出生前
就开始倡议非暴力反抗运动

translation.en: -So hit me. -Bayard, I can take care of myself.
translation.zh:
-要打就打我
-贝亚德 我应付得来

translation.en: The pacifist is opposed to using violence, but must be prepared to receive it.
translation.zh:
虽然和平主义者反对使用暴力
但必须做好面对暴力的准备

translation.en: Only aim left.
translation.zh: 打左边就好

translation.en: A policeman in '42 already took care of the right.
translation.zh: 右边在1942年已经被一位警察打过了

translation.en: Symmetry.
translation.zh: 这样才对称嘛

translation.en: I hear when King said "git,"
translation.zh: 听说金叫你滚蛋时

translation.en: you tucked your tail between your legs and swished away.
translation.zh: 你夹着尾巴 垂头丧气地溜走了

translation.en: You're irrelevant.
translation.zh: 你什么都不是

translation.en: It's Friday night. I've been called worse.
translation.zh:
这是周五夜晚
我听过别人说我更难听的话

translation.en: So, what are you gonna do?
translation.zh: 那你打算怎么办？

translation.en: Offering my face as a punching bag to a would-be Sugar Ray wasn't enough?
translation.zh:
我都把脸让给未来黑人拳王打了
还不够吗？

translation.en: I am talking about the party.
translation.zh: 我是指这场集会

translation.en: A party is hors d'oeuvres, laughter, mambo for Latin lovers on the hi-fi.
translation.zh:
现场都是小吃、谈笑风生的人
还开音响为拉丁情侣播放曼波音乐

translation.en: Earlier today, a fight almost broke out. It did not used to be like that.
translation.zh:
今天早些时候 差点就打起架来
以前不是这样的

translation.en: And now it is like that all the time. SNCC, CORE, the NAACP kids,
translation.zh:
如今整天都在吵闹
学生非暴力协委会 民族平等大会
全国有色人种协进会的年轻人

translation.en: we're all fighting over agendas and slogans and songs.
translation.zh:
都在为政治议程
口号和抗争歌的事争吵不休

translation.en: -And you know who's winning? -Something tells me I'm about to find out.
translation.zh:
-知道谁渔翁得利吗？
-我很快就会知道了

translation.en: Bull Connor in Birmingham, Strom Thurmond on the Senate floor.
translation.zh:
身在伯明翰的“公牛”康纳
斯托姆·瑟蒙德参议员

translation.en: While we all snap and snarl and eat each other alive.
translation.zh: 我们只顾着互相抨击、叫嚣和吞噬

translation.en: -So, what are you gonna do? -I already have a job.
translation.zh: 那你打算怎么办？ 我已经有任务在身了

translation.en: Muste and I have worked together off and on since I was in my twenties.
translation.zh: 我和穆斯特偶尔会合作…

translation.en: The man hates you because you possess everything that he does not,
translation.zh:
那家伙对你没好感
因为你拥有他所没有的特质

translation.en: charm, passion, a goddamn pulse.
translation.zh: 魅力、热忱和活力

translation.en: Tom, you've yet to learn it is unwise to speak of that which you do not know.
translation.zh:
汤姆 你还没学会
乱下判断是鲁莽之举的道理

translation.en: Why don't you just admit that you're still upset
translation.zh: 你怎么不直接承认你至今还在为

translation.en: over what happened between you and Dr. King,
translation.zh: 你和金博士之间的事感到难过？

translation.en: and so you will use any excuse,
translation.zh: 所以你会找任何借口

translation.en: including working a job that you hate… -Irrational. -…to avoid a cause that you love?
translation.zh:
包括去做一份你痛恨的工作
只为了逃避你热衷的使命？

translation.en: You're smart about some things, not about everything.
translation.zh:
你在某些事上很有想法
但不代表你无所不知

translation.en: I can have an opinion.
translation.zh: 我有权发表观点

translation.en: And when it comes to my life, my past, especially as it relates to Martin,
translation.zh:
可是事情涉及我的人生、过去
特别是我和马丁的关系时

translation.en: I have the right to say, "Enough!"
translation.zh: 我绝对有权说：“够了”

translation.en: Last time I checked, that was illegal.
translation.zh: 据我所知 吸大麻属于非法行为

translation.en: Last time I checked, so were we.
translation.zh:
据我所知
我们的关系也属于非法行为

translation.en: -I've had an idea. -Hm.
translation.zh: 我有个想法

translation.en: Wanna be my assistant again?
translation.zh: 要当我的助理吗？

translation.en: Of course.
translation.zh: 求之不得

translation.en: Give me the Randolph/Truman '48 folder. In that trunk over there.
translation.zh:
帮我把那边抽屉里的
1948年《伦道夫/杜鲁门》档案拿来

translation.en: Thirty years ago, Gandhi walked to the sea,
translation.zh: 30年前 甘地走进大海

translation.en: picked up a handful of salt,
translation.zh: 抓起一撮盐

translation.en: and inspired a movement that brought down an empire.
translation.zh:
从此掀起了一场起义运动
最终推翻了一个王国

translation.en: The time has come for us to do the same.
translation.zh: 如今轮到我们这么做了

translation.en: We are going to put together
translation.zh: 我们将举办一场

translation.en: the largest peaceful protest in the history of this nation.
translation.zh:
全国有史以来
规模最庞大的和平示威运动

translation.en: How big?
translation.zh: 多大？

translation.en: One hundred thousand people.
translation.zh: 十万人

translation.en: Is he for real?
translation.zh: 他说真的吗？

translation.en: A massive two-day demonstration
translation.zh: 这是一场为期两天的示威运动

translation.en: with enough power to shut down the White House and Capitol Hill.
translation.zh: 其影响力足以关闭白宫和国会山

translation.en: Made up of angelic troublemakers such as yourselves,
translation.zh:
示威群众正是由
像你们这种善良的滋事者组成

translation.en: with ideas so bold, so inspiring,
translation.zh: 这群人思维大胆 启迪人心

translation.en: their execution will demand all groups draw tightly together and become one.
translation.zh:
他们的行动足以紧紧团结所有群体
实现万众一心

translation.en: So, talk, shout, take command!
translation.zh: 尽管说 尽管叫 尽管发号施令

translation.en: What if we flood the offices of every member of the House and Senate
translation.zh:
我建议我们携同
教会、工会和民权组织的代表

translation.en: with delegates of the church, labor, civil rights?
translation.zh:
涌入每位众议员和参议员的办公室
你们说如何？

translation.en: -And-- -And? And?
translation.zh:
-然后呢？
-然后…

translation.en: And such numbers the legislative branch will cease to function.
translation.zh: 人数多到立法机构无法操作

translation.en: Write it on the wall.
translation.zh: 去写在墙上

translation.en: No, no. It is impossible to train that many effective lobbyists--
translation.zh:
行不通 我们不可能训练出
这么多有效率的游行示威者…

translation.en: No, no, no. Do not kill an impulse before it's born.
translation.zh:
先别这么说
火都还没点着就被你浇熄了

translation.en: What if they were constituents from their respective states
translation.zh: 万一这群来自各州的选民

translation.en: who refused to leave until they've been heard?
translation.zh:
由于诉求未得到答允前
而拒绝离开怎么办？

translation.en: -Now that's collaboration. -[all laugh]
translation.zh: 这时我们就需要团队协作力

translation.en: -[Bayard] Write it on the wall. -Why can't you be collaborative like Norm?
translation.zh:
-写在墙上
-你怎么不合群点？学学诺姆嘛

translation.en: -I… Shut up. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 我还是闭嘴好了

translation.en: -Somebody didn't go home last night. -Shut up. [chuckles]
translation.zh:
-昨晚有人彻夜未归啊
-少说几句

translation.en: Rachelle? How many bodies does it take to surround the White House?
translation.zh:
瑞秋 需要多少人
才能将白宫团团包围？

translation.en: How many?
translation.zh: 多少人？

translation.en: Sorry. I thought that was a setup for a joke.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我还以为你要我配合你说段子

translation.en: -You literally want me to find out? -Yes!
translation.zh:
-要我去查看吗？
-是的

translation.en: Because on day two, we shall surround the White House…
translation.zh:
因为第二天
我们就会将白宫团团包围

translation.en: Draw the White House on the board.
translation.zh: 麻烦你把白宫画在墙上

translation.en: …while serenading the president.
translation.zh: 对着总统高唱抗争歌

translation.en: ♪ Ain't gonna let the president Turn me around ♪
translation.zh: 我绝不屈服于总统的权威

translation.en: Come on now.
translation.zh: 唱吧

translation.en: ♪ Turn me around ♪
translation.zh: 我绝不屈服

translation.en: ♪ Turn me around ♪
translation.zh: 我绝不屈服

translation.en: ♪ Ain't gonna let the president Turn me around ♪
translation.zh: 我绝不屈服于总统的权威

translation.en: -♪ I'm gonna-- ♪ -♪ Keep on walking ♪
translation.zh:
-我要…
-不断往前走

translation.en: ♪ Keep on talking ♪
translation.zh: 不断往前走

translation.en: Come on now.
translation.zh: 唱吧

translation.en: ♪ Marching up to freedom land ♪
translation.zh: 往自由之地前进

translation.en: Well, what about sleeping arrangements? DC only has so many Negro hotels.
translation.zh:
住宿方面怎么安排？
华府允许非裔同胞入住的酒店不多

translation.en: How about tents? You know, like a--
translation.zh: 不如搭帐篷吧？像…

translation.en: A sea of tents, big and bold enough to unify an entire movement.
translation.zh:
搭起海量的帐篷 又大又显眼
足以团结全体示威群众

translation.en: -Give me that thing. -[all laugh]
translation.zh: 笔给我

translation.en: And near the Lincoln Memorial, a stage where the head
translation.zh: 接着在林肯纪念堂附近搭建舞台

translation.en: of every civil rights organization can be heard.
translation.zh: 让所有民权组织的领导人发表演讲

translation.en: Why just the heads?
translation.zh: 为什么只有领导人上台演讲？

translation.en: [Bayard] More! More!
translation.zh: 更多人上台演讲！

translation.en: We're not done yet.
translation.zh: 还没结束呢

translation.en: You know there's a lot we can do.
translation.zh: 我们能做的事很多

translation.en: -Get the signatures. We'll follow up-- -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-去收集签名 我们会跟进的
-好的

translation.en: That's a really good start.
translation.zh: 这是个很好的开始

translation.en: I think we need to organize this in a way that we all can…
translation.zh:
我们必须用一种
大家都能配合的方法来举办这项…

translation.en: In '41, you called for a large-scale march
translation.zh:
1941年
你召集了一支大型示威游行队伍

translation.en: to protest discrimination in the defense industry but then canceled.
translation.zh:
抗议国防工业的种族歧视行为
活动后来被取消了

translation.en: No, Roosevelt acquiesced to our demands.
translation.zh:
不是 那是因为罗斯福总统
默允了我们的诉求

translation.en: As did Truman in '48.
translation.zh:
1948年
杜鲁门总统也应允了我们的诉求

translation.en: Executive Order 9981,
translation.zh: 《第9981例行政命令》

translation.en: the end of segregation in the armed forces.
translation.zh: 为军队种族隔离制度画下句点

translation.en: -[spoon clinks] -The time has come for another.
translation.zh: 是时候再来一场革命了

translation.en: -No, Bayard. -I can handle all the grunt work.
translation.zh: 不行 贝亚德 粗活尽管交给我去办

translation.en: Building a grassroots operation, rally the young.
translation.zh:
我们要推动草根运动
激起年轻一代的改革之心

translation.en: But when it comes to the old guard…
translation.zh: 只是面对老一代的保守派…

translation.en: -Roy. -Especially Roy.
translation.zh:
-你是指罗伊
-特别是罗伊

translation.en: …I'm considered a pariah.
translation.zh: 我就被视为眼中钉

translation.en: I need you.
translation.zh: 我需要你

translation.en: Bayard, I can't.
translation.zh: 贝亚德 恕我无能为力

translation.en: If Lucille makes it to another summer--
translation.zh: 如果露西尔能撑到下一个夏天…

translation.en: We honor her by doing the work we've always done.
translation.zh:
继续完成我们的使命
才算是没有辜负她

translation.en: The work the two of you did together.
translation.zh: 完成我们俩共同的使命

translation.en: No matter what Roy says or does, I need you to behave.
translation.zh:
一会儿无论罗伊说什么、做什么
都麻烦你克制点

translation.en: I do not have issues with Roy. It's Roy who has issues with me.
translation.zh: 我跟罗伊无冤无仇 是罗伊对我意见

translation.en: But in deference to both you and the cause,
translation.zh: 但为了尊重你和这项使命

translation.en: I'll sit in the corner and smile.
translation.zh: 我会坐在角落 面带微笑

translation.en: After a day spent flooding the capital and encircling the White House
translation.zh: 涌入首都 包围白宫整天

translation.en: so that the president of the United States cannot get in or out of his own home,
translation.zh: 确保美国总统无法出入总统府后

translation.en: our intrepid protesters would retire to tents which now cover the National Mall.
translation.zh:
我们大无畏的示威同胞们
将回到遍布国家广场的帐篷里

translation.en: Chief, do you plan on pulling this together yourself?
translation.zh: 头儿 你打算自己策划吗？

translation.en: We all know there's only one person who can organize an event of this scale.
translation.zh:
我们都知道只有一个人
能策划出这种规模的活动

translation.en: Bayard.
translation.zh: 贝亚德

translation.en: I was under the impression you were busy serving--
translation.zh: 我以为你在忙着为白人服务…

translation.en: I mean, saving white people from the bomb.
translation.zh:
我是指你不是在忙着拯救白人
免于被炸弹轰炸吗？

translation.en: -[scattered chuckling] -I go where needed.
translation.zh: 哪里需要我 我就去哪里

translation.en: Chief, if memory serves me, this is your third attempt.
translation.zh:
头儿 如果我没记错的话
这是第三次企图策划这项活动了

translation.en: -He did not say "attempt." -Did you say something?
translation.zh:
-他竟然用“企图”这个词
-你说什么？

translation.en: "Attempt" is hardly the word I'd use to describe the actions of a man
translation.zh: 我不会用“企图”这个词来形容

translation.en: who is single-handedly responsible for integrating both the armed forces and the defense industry.
translation.zh:
一位凭一己之力废除
军队和国防工业种族隔离制度的人

translation.en: -[man] Roy. -[Roy] Yes, Medgar.
translation.zh:
-罗伊
-是 梅德加

translation.en: Most of our folks in Mississippi have never been outside of their hometowns,
translation.zh:
密西西比州的乡亲们
大都没离开过家乡

translation.en: so the opportunity to march with people from all over…
translation.zh:
如果来自各地的同胞们
有机会一起走上街头游行

translation.en: There it is.
translation.zh: 说得好

translation.en: …will afford them the chance to discover not only are they not alone…
translation.zh:
不仅有可能让他们意识到
自己并非孤身一人

translation.en: He gets it.
translation.zh: 他明白事理

translation.en: …but are engaged in a struggle far greater than they ever dreamed.
translation.zh:
也能让他们参与
远比想像中规模更大的抗争运动

translation.en: Thank you, Brother Evers.
translation.zh: 谢了 埃弗斯弟兄

translation.en: Chief, what size crowd are you projecting? One hundred thousand people.
translation.zh:
-预计多少人参与？
-十万人

translation.en: -[murmuring] -[man 2] It can't be done.
translation.zh: 不会吧？不可能

translation.en: Mr. Wilkins, forgive me, but that's impractical.
translation.zh:
威尔金斯先生 请恕我直言
这也太不切实际了

translation.en: Elias here's from Alabama, field organizer.
translation.zh:
来自阿拉巴马州的伊莱亚斯
是外勤策划员

translation.en: Perhaps you have facts to substantiate your claims?
translation.zh:
你能不能举几个实例
来支持你的说法？

translation.en: Previous DC demonstrations.
translation.zh: 纵观以往在华府办过的示威活动

translation.en: In 1913, 8,000 suffragettes,
translation.zh:
1913年
有八千位女性参政论者走上街头

translation.en: in '26, 25,000 Ku Klux Klan,
translation.zh:
1926年
两万五千位三K党成员游行示威

translation.en: and in 1932, 42,000 veterans marched and were attacked with tear gas and tanks.
translation.zh:
1932年 四万两千位退伍军人
走上街头 被催泪弹和坦克攻击

translation.en: -[Roy] Who led the attack? -The military.
translation.zh:
-谁带头发动攻击？
-军队

translation.en: -And the race of the veterans? -White.
translation.zh:
-退伍军人是什么种族？
-白人

translation.en: White boys.
translation.zh: 白人男子

translation.en: Young man, your facts are correct. Your sense of history is not.
translation.zh:
年轻人 你举出的实例正确无误
但你对历史的触觉错了

translation.en: Those 42,000 men marched on Washington, DC because it was the Depression.
translation.zh:
四万两千人走上华盛顿街头
是因为经历大萧条

translation.en: And after dutifully serving their country,
translation.zh: 他们为国效力

translation.en: found themselves without jobs and homes and food to feed their family.
translation.zh:
回国后却失去工作和家园
也没有能力抚养家人

translation.en: And when they took to the streets and were attacked,
translation.zh: 他们走上街头 却被攻击

translation.en: the world did, in fact, bear witness.
translation.zh: 全世界都看在眼里

translation.en: Gandhi brought an empire down to its knees--
translation.zh: 甘地成功推翻了一个帝国的统治

translation.en: Will someone please tell this man that this is not India?
translation.zh: 谁能告诉这家伙这里不是印度

translation.en: For decades, the NAACP has been legally leading the charge,
translation.zh:
几十年以来 非裔民权运动
向来由全国有色人种协进会主导

translation.en: and now you're proposing 100,000 Black folks invade Washington, DC.
translation.zh: 如今你提议号召十万同胞进军华盛顿

translation.en: -Have you talked to Martin about this? -I lost his number. He lost mine.
translation.zh:
-你问过马丁了吗？
-我们都弄丢了彼此的联络号码

translation.en: Well, Dr. King, who hasn't lost my number,
translation.zh: 金博士可没弄丢我的联络号码

translation.en: has come to understand that mass lobbying is sheer madness.
translation.zh: 他认为大肆游说政客是不理智的做法

translation.en: Brown v. Board is the crowning glory of this organization,
translation.zh:
布朗诉托皮卡教育局案
是这个组织最耀眼的功绩

translation.en: yet all across the South, when Negro children sleep,
translation.zh: 但在美国南部各地 非裔儿童入眠后

translation.en: they see "whites only" signs instead of their dreams.
translation.zh: 只会看到“仅限白人”四个大字

translation.en: Counting on the courts to eradicate racial inequity,
translation.zh: 指望法院来根除种族不平等

translation.en: that's madness!
translation.zh: 才是不理智的做法！

translation.en: Mr. Randolph, you are a giant amongst men,
translation.zh: 伦道夫先生 你的确是个伟人

translation.en: but when it comes to this,
translation.zh: 但论这事

translation.en: the NAACP says no.
translation.zh: 全国有色人种协进会不支持

translation.en: Now that Roy has made his position clear,
translation.zh: 如今罗伊已经表明立场了

translation.en: Dr. King's number, which you have allegedly lost?
translation.zh: 你说你把金博士的联络号码弄丢了

translation.en: Go find it.
translation.zh: 去找出来

translation.en: "When an individual is protesting society's refusal to acknowledge his dignity,
translation.zh:
“一个抗议社会
拒绝给予自己尊重的人

translation.en: his act of protest confers dignity on him."
translation.zh:
这种抗议行为
本身就已经为他赢得了尊重”

translation.en: -Why are you quoting me to me? -You're an inspiration.
translation.zh:
-为什么对着我引用我说的话？
-你是启发我们的力量

translation.en: Inspiration untethered from action loses all value.
translation.zh: 只有启发 没有行动 一切都是枉然

translation.en: Who said that?
translation.zh: 谁说的？

translation.en: -I did… -[zipper zips] -…just now. -[toilet flushes]
translation.zh: 我刚刚说的

translation.en: Now, I agree with Mr. Evers. Your idea has potential.
translation.zh:
听好 我站埃弗斯先生
你的想法充满可能性

translation.en: I would have spoken up, but I didn't think it was my place.
translation.zh:
我也想替你说话
只可惜我没有这种资格

translation.en: It wasn't your place to voice support, but it was yours to help tear it down?
translation.zh:
你没有资格发言力挺
却有资格搞破坏？

translation.en: Your march is possible without the NAACP, but not without Dr. King.
translation.zh:
即便没有全国有色人种协进会的支持
你的游行还是可行的 只是万万不能没有金博士

translation.en: And Mr. Wilkins knows it.
translation.zh: 这点威尔金斯先生也很清楚

translation.en: Elias Taylor.
translation.zh: 我叫伊莱亚斯·泰勒

translation.en: Looked like you was about to ask.
translation.zh: 你刚刚看起来想问我叫什么名字

translation.en: I was about to ask something, but it wasn't that.
translation.zh:
我确实想问你一件事
不过不是问你叫什么名字

translation.en: -I was warned. [chuckles] -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 别人都说你直性子

translation.en: Well, whatever you wanna say, you just say it.
translation.zh: 说你说话不拐弯抹角

translation.en: -Doesn't everyone? -No.
translation.zh:
-大家不都是这样吗？
-不是

translation.en: No, most people are modest, cautious, afraid.
translation.zh:
不是 大部分人都含蓄内敛
小心翼翼、战战兢兢

translation.en: So say it, whatever's on your mind this very second. No caution, no fear.
translation.zh:
此时此刻 你有话不妨直说
不必小心翼翼 战战兢兢

translation.en: My wife is in town through Saturday night.
translation.zh: 我老婆进城了 她会待到周六晚上

translation.en: [man] Now, Mr. Wilkins here, he's a…
translation.zh: 这位威尔金斯先生是个…

translation.en: Mr. Rustin. Claudia Taylor.
translation.zh: 鲁斯汀先生 我是克劳迪娅·泰勒

translation.en: -Have we… -Oh, years ago.
translation.zh:
-我们见过…
-几年前见过

translation.en: I volunteered for the Women's Political Council during the bus boycott.
translation.zh:
公车抵制运动期间
我在女性参政理事会当过义工

translation.en: [inhales] You spoke, and my spirit soared.
translation.zh: 你的演讲使我心潮澎湃

translation.en: Uh, Elias.
translation.zh: 伊莱亚斯

translation.en: Have you two met?
translation.zh: 你们见过了吗？

translation.en: -Just now. -Earlier?
translation.zh:
-刚刚见过了
-刚刚？

translation.en: Mr. Wilkins chose Elias to coordinate the efforts
translation.zh: 伊莱亚斯获威尔金斯先生委任为

translation.en: between the national and regional branches
translation.zh: 中央和各区域分布之间的协调员

translation.en: before he takes over for my daddy's church.
translation.zh: 以后他也将接管我爸的教堂

translation.en: Such a vocation holds great rewards both worldly and celestial.
translation.zh: 还真是一条既属世又属灵的青云路啊

translation.en: -A heavenly calling indeed. -[Bayard] Hm.
translation.zh: 确实是上帝的感召

translation.en: But once my daddy says yes, I expect a Lincoln like my mama's.
translation.zh:
一旦我爸点头后
我希望能坐上跟我妈一样的林肯豪车

translation.en: Well, I hope to see you both again very soon, perhaps on the Sabbath.
translation.zh:
希望能很快再见到你们夫妇俩
那就周日见吧

translation.en: Oh, sadly, no. I leave Saturday.
translation.zh: 很遗憾 我周六就要走了

translation.en: But wouldn't that have been a dream?
translation.zh:
但如果能再见到你
那就像是做梦一样 不是吗？

translation.en: Careful.
translation.zh: 小心点

translation.en: I asked you to be my assistant, not Mrs. Rustin.
translation.zh: 我请你当我的助理 不是我的贤内助

translation.en: That is, if you still want the job.
translation.zh: 除非你想辞职不干了

translation.en: The first time I was invited into Martin's home,
translation.zh: 第一次获邀到马丁家做客

translation.en: there were guns under the sofa, guards on the front porch.
translation.zh:
我发现他家沙发底下藏着几把枪
门外站着几位守卫

translation.en: Understandably so, given the threats being leveled at he and his family.
translation.zh:
考虑到他一家大小遭受的威胁
这是情有可原的

translation.en: I started talking to him about passive resistance.
translation.zh: 我开始劝他采取非暴力反抗策略

translation.en: Over time, the guns went away.
translation.zh: 久而久之 他家里不再藏枪

translation.en: So Dr. King's stance on nonviolence, he got from you?
translation.zh:
原来金博士是受到你的影响
才坚持非暴力抗议的立场？

translation.en: -By way of Jesus Christ, Gandhi, Thoreau. -[laughs]
translation.zh:
应该是受到耶稣
甘地和梭罗的影响才对

translation.en: So he trusted you.
translation.zh: 所以你是他信任的人

translation.en: I always told him what I knew to be true.
translation.zh: 我向来只跟他说真话

translation.en: Excuse me. Vodka water.
translation.zh: 打扰一下 请给我来一杯伏特加水

translation.en: And how about a… Manhattan?
translation.zh: 你要不要来一杯曼哈顿？

translation.en: -Ha! After two, you'll be a changed man. -Well, in that case, give me three.
translation.zh:
-两杯下肚后 你就会变了个人
-那就给我来三杯吧

translation.en: Oh, the man is asthmatic. Mm.
translation.zh: 天啊 那个声称有哮喘的男人

translation.en: Now, he can barely walk or breathe,
translation.zh: 平日走不动 上气不接下气

translation.en: but the second he hits that pulpit, you know the end of the world is at hand.
translation.zh:
可是一旦走上讲台
世界末日近在眉睫

translation.en: -Oh! Well, I'm gonna burn in hell. -For sharing how you feel?
translation.zh:
-看来我要下地狱被火烧了
-是因为说真心话吗？

translation.en: Oh, for not revering a man who welcomed me into his home and hates my guts.
translation.zh:
是因为不尊重一位对我敞开心扉
却又对我恨之入骨的人

translation.en: And I feel the exact same way about him.
translation.zh: 我对他也是这种感受

translation.en: Oh, you're bad. You're good. I'll have another. Do you want one?
translation.zh:
是你不好 不错嘛
再来一杯 你要不要再来一杯？

translation.en: You got it.
translation.zh: 没问题

translation.en: So, the church,
translation.zh: 话说那所教堂

translation.en: your dream or hers?
translation.zh: 是你还是她的梦想？

translation.en: Well, I've always wanted to serve the Lord.
translation.zh: 侍奉上帝一直是我的梦想

translation.en: -And you were raised… -Quaker.
translation.zh:
-你小时候是在…
-是在贵格会长大

translation.en: My parents… [chuckles]
translation.zh: 我爸妈…

translation.en: Well, really, my grandparents raised me after their daughter,
translation.zh:
说得确切点 我是外公外婆带大的
因为他们的女儿…

translation.en: my mother, flew the coop.
translation.zh: 也就是我妈 她跑路了

translation.en: So… the rumors about you and Dr. King…
translation.zh: 谣传你和金博士…

translation.en: Ugh! An ugly lie
translation.zh: 是有心人恶意造谣

translation.en: perpetrated by Adam Clayton Powell to stop a planned protest.
translation.zh:
始作俑者就是亚当·克莱顿·鲍威尔
只为了阻止一场策划好的示威活动

translation.en: He threatened to share his lie with the press.
translation.zh: 他威胁要把他捏造的谣言泄露给媒体

translation.en: I called Martin's bluff and resigned.
translation.zh: 我骂马丁虚有其表 然后毅然辞职了

translation.en: [chuckles] He accepted,
translation.zh: 他接受了我的辞呈

translation.en: effectively ending my connection to the movement.
translation.zh: 强制切断了我和民权运动之间的联系

translation.en: Months later, Reverend Powell was made chairman of the House Committee on Education and Labor.
translation.zh:
几个月后 鲍威尔牧师获任为
众议院教育与劳动力委员会会长

translation.en: You're okay…
translation.zh: 你不介意吗？

translation.en: in here…
translation.zh: 这么晚了

translation.en: at this hour.
translation.zh: 还待在这里

translation.en: That's drilled into you the day you're born, huh?
translation.zh:
我们一生下来
就被灌输这种理念了 对吧？

translation.en: They think you're less than, so you gotta be better than.
translation.zh:
他们认为我们不如他们
所以我们必须比他们更努力

translation.en: -Yes. -So be charming, be perfect, be polite.
translation.zh:
-是啊
-要讨人喜欢 不能犯错 不能失礼

translation.en: The suffocating chains of Negro respectability.
translation.zh:
这种对非裔同胞的道德行为标准
简直令人窒息

translation.en: When I told Ma Rustin I preferred dancing with boys instead of girls, she said,
translation.zh:
我跟我外婆说比起女生
我更喜欢跟男生跳舞时 她问：“你希望我怎么做呢？”

translation.en: "What would you have me do with that?"
translation.zh: 她问：“你希望我怎么做呢？”

translation.en: And then she said, "I suppose that's what you need to do."
translation.zh: 接着她说：“这是你自己的责任”

translation.en: When Martin speaks, he holds nothing back.
translation.zh: 马丁说话毫无保留

translation.en: That's what people feel when they hear him.
translation.zh: 这就是人们听他说话时的感受

translation.en: Truth.
translation.zh: 他们听到真话

translation.en: So tell me,
translation.zh: 我问你

translation.en: Elias Taylor,
translation.zh: 伊莱亚斯·泰勒

translation.en: how can you preach salvation
translation.zh: 如果你无意拯救自己

translation.en: and not wanna save yourself?
translation.zh: 试问你怎么带领人获得救赎？

translation.en: How can you speak of love
translation.zh: 如果你的心灵和肉体分开了

translation.en: when your heart is disconnected from your flesh?
translation.zh: 试问你怎么宣讲何谓“爱”？

translation.en: And when Roy said, "Elias, can you substantiate your claim?"
translation.zh:
罗伊问你
能不能举证来支持你的说法时

translation.en: and you pulled out that piece of paper,
translation.zh: 你竟然拿出一张纸

translation.en: I hope you didn't think that I was go--
translation.zh: 希望你不会以为我…

translation.en: [softly] Teach me how not to be afraid.
translation.zh: 教我要怎么感到不害怕

translation.en: Good night.
translation.zh: 晚安

translation.en: [woman] Lord, no.
translation.zh: 天啊 不会吧？

translation.en: [man] Shame on Reverend King.
translation.zh: 金牧师真可耻

translation.en: Sending those poor children to march the streets of Birmingham?
translation.zh:
竟然派这些可怜的年轻人
走上伯明翰街头示威

translation.en: A man in uniform unleashes attack dogs, turns fire hoses on the innocent,
translation.zh:
一位身穿制服的男人对着无辜民众
放猛犬和喷水

translation.en: and the first words out of your goddamn mouth are "shame on Reverend King"?
translation.zh:
从你的臭口中吐出的第一句话竟然是
“金牧师真可耻”

translation.en: Bayard, there's no reason--
translation.zh: 贝亚德 没必要…

translation.en: You see this and think, "Those poor Negroes down south,"
translation.zh:
你看到这种画面
心里觉得这些南方黑人可怜

translation.en: incapable of understanding they are beyond powerful,
translation.zh: 却看不到他们拥有无比强大的意志力

translation.en: because today they discovered a bravery they never knew they had.
translation.zh:
因为今天
他们刚发现到自己前所未有的勇气

translation.en: -A bravery you'll never know. -[colleague] Now, Bayard--
translation.zh:
-这种勇气你永远不会理解
-贝亚德 你听…

translation.en: You sit behind that desk as you've sat for over 30 years,
translation.zh:
你只会坐在办公桌后
过去30年来动也不动

translation.en: convincing yourself that you're committed to saving the world,
translation.zh: 却自以为在拯救世界

translation.en: when the only thing you're committed to is your own safety and superiority.
translation.zh: 实际上 你只在乎自己的安全和地位

translation.en: Bayard, enough.
translation.zh: 贝亚德 够了

translation.en: Railing against Jim because of the color of his skin.
translation.zh: 你基于吉姆的肤色而抨击他…

translation.en: I'm not railing against Jim because of the color of his skin.
translation.zh: 我不是基于他的肤色而抨击他

translation.en: I'm railing at Jim for being arrogant and ill-informed.
translation.zh: 我抨击他是因为他蒙昧无知

translation.en: The fact that he happens to be white while doing so, well,
translation.zh: 但他既是白人 又蒙昧无知

translation.en: that's between him and the Lord.
translation.zh: 我看他要问问上帝是怎么回事了

translation.en: Every day, we agree to surrender that which makes us different
translation.zh:
每天 我们都说好
要放下彼此之间的差异

translation.en: so that together we might forge a more humane world.
translation.zh: 以建设一个更人道的世界

translation.en: I can't surrender my differences. The world won't let me.
translation.zh: 这世界不允许我放下自己的差异

translation.en: And even if I could, I wouldn't want to. Not today.
translation.zh: 就算我能 我也不想要 门都没有

translation.en: Not today.
translation.zh: 门都没有

translation.en: What are you doing? Where are you going?
translation.zh: 你干什么？要去哪里？

translation.en: Bayard, you must stay here where I can protect you
translation.zh: 贝亚德 你不能离开 否则我护不了你

translation.en: from the world and from yourself.
translation.zh: 避免你被世界和自己伤害

translation.en: You are a man of exceptional skills and of keen intellect,
translation.zh: 你是难得一见的人才 你聪明能干

translation.en: but until you admit your anger at being abandoned by your parents,
translation.zh:
但假如你无法承认
你爸妈当初弃你于不顾

translation.en: which is why you became homosexual, to hurt them and yourself,
translation.zh:
是导致你成为同性恋
造成你去伤害他人和自己的原因

translation.en: you will never be fully whole, do you hear me?
translation.zh:
那你永远都无法成为一个完整的人
听懂了吗？

translation.en: Not as a man and not as a person committed to saving the world.
translation.zh:
无法成为男人
也无法成为拯救世界的人

translation.en: Mr. Muste, sir, have you ever been to a Negro church?
translation.zh:
穆斯迪先生 头儿
你去过非裔教堂吗？

translation.en: Innumerable times.
translation.zh: 无数次

translation.en: As a Quaker, I'd never seen anything like it.
translation.zh:
作为贵格会会友
非裔教堂里的情景是我前所未见的

translation.en: The hand-clapping, the singing, the shouting.
translation.zh: 他们拍手、歌唱、喊叫

translation.en: It felt like…
translation.zh: 感觉就像…

translation.en: exalted rage.
translation.zh: 愤怒被升华了

translation.en: So instead of standing here and saying something I might regret,
translation.zh:
所以与其站在这里说出
我可能会后悔的话

translation.en: I'm gonna leave.
translation.zh: 我决定辞职

translation.en: And this coming Sunday…
translation.zh: 这个星期天

translation.en: I'm going to church.
translation.zh: 我会去教堂

translation.en: This, uh, new young preacher that's working for Roy,
translation.zh: 知道那位替罗伊办事的年轻牧师吗？

translation.en: I hear he's so fine the Lord cried when he made him.
translation.zh:
听说他才貌双全
上帝创造他时都感动到流泪了

translation.en: I have no idea to what or whom you are referring.
translation.zh: 我不知道你说的人是谁

translation.en: What about the other one? What's his name? The… The pale one. Tom.
translation.zh:
那我就说另一个吧
他叫什么名字来着？ 那个白人 叫汤姆

translation.en: -[laughs] -Is that more your flavor?
translation.zh: 他更符合你的口味吗？

translation.en: I am drawn to beauty,
translation.zh: 凡是好看的人我都喜欢

translation.en: Black, white, indeterminate, so long as they're passionate and smart.
translation.zh:
黑白也好 肤色不明也罢
只要有热情、有智慧 我都喜欢

translation.en: Why is everyone so obsessed with what I'm doing and with whom?
translation.zh:
怎么大家都这么关注我在忙什么？
关注我跟谁在一起？

translation.en: I'm just curious as to why it took you so long to return my calls.
translation.zh:
我只是想知道
为什么你隔了这么久才回电

translation.en: Because, my dear Miss Baker, you casually ask questions
translation.zh:
亲爱的贝克小姐
因为你每次随口问问的问题

translation.en: which cut to the core of one's soul.
translation.zh: 总能击中要害

translation.en: -So why aren't you on a bus to Atlanta? -Because I do not care.
translation.zh:
-那你怎么不坐车去亚特兰大？
-因为我不在乎

translation.en: And besides, Dr. King is doing just fine.
translation.zh: 再说 金博士现在过得很好

translation.en: Albany, Georgia.
translation.zh: 他刚经历了乔治亚州的奥尔巴尼运动

translation.en: -You call that doing just fine? -Who tries to integrate an entire town?
translation.zh:
-这是哪门子的“好”啊？
-团结一个城市的人有用吗？

translation.en: Your focus must be singular. A… A lunch counter, a bus boycott.
translation.zh:
你们做事钻牛角尖
什么午餐静坐、公车抵制

translation.en: Sheriff Pritchett undermined every media-savvy move Martin made.
translation.zh:
普里切特警长已经成功削弱了
马丁的全部媒体宣传策略

translation.en: As a result, the civil rights struggle got swept off the front pages of The New York Times.
translation.zh:
也因此 《纽约时报》不再报导
民权抗争的新闻

translation.en: -[phone ringing] -I thought you didn't care.
translation.zh: 还说你不在乎呢？

translation.en: Of course I care about the cause. More so Coretta and the kids.
translation.zh:
我当然在乎这个使命
更在乎科丽塔和孩子们

translation.en: -Just answer the phone. -[Bayard] Yes?
translation.zh:
-去接吧
-是

translation.en: [softly] Ella, turn on the TV.
translation.zh: 艾拉 打开电视

translation.en: What? Okay.
translation.zh: 什么？好的

translation.en: …where legal remedies are not at hand.
translation.zh: 循法律途径解决不了的问题

translation.en: Redress is sought in the streets, in demonstrations and protests,
translation.zh:
人们唯有走上街头
通过示威和抗议来平反

translation.en: which create tensions and threaten violence and threaten lives.
translation.zh:
导致社会局势紧张
构成潜在暴力冲突 危及人命

translation.en: We face, therefore, a moral crisis as a country and a people.
translation.zh:
由此可见
国家和人民面对的是道德危机

translation.en: Next week, I shall ask the Congress of the United States to act.
translation.zh:
下周 我将在美国国会上
催促政府采取行动

translation.en: To make a commitment it has not fully made in this century
translation.zh: 实践本世纪未曾全面兑现的承诺

translation.en: to the proposition that race has no place
translation.zh: 以确保美国社会和法律中

translation.en: in American life or law.
translation.zh: 不存在种族歧视

translation.en: The Federal--
translation.zh: 联邦政府…

translation.en: On your own, you and Martin are fine,
translation.zh:
如果你和马丁独立行动
双方都不会有事

translation.en: but together, you are fire.
translation.zh: 但如果你们合作 只有他会出事

translation.en: -Now, he needs you… -I can't.
translation.zh:
-听好 他需要你…
-我做不到

translation.en: …to help him figure out what's next, and you need him
translation.zh:
…帮他策划下一步怎么走 你则需要他帮你
将这场游行示威运动变成全国运动

translation.en: to nationalize this march.
translation.zh:
你则需要他帮你
将这场游行示威运动变成全国运动

translation.en: And don't you dare tell me about your damn job as an excuse.
translation.zh: 别再把你的工作当成借口了

translation.en: I quit my job this afternoon or took a leave of absence or something.
translation.zh:
我今午辞职了
说是请假什么的也可以

translation.en: Good.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: A shark trapped in a damn shot glass.
translation.zh: 金麟岂是池中物

translation.en: Now, I never believed for one second Powell's lie,
translation.zh: 我从未相信过鲍威尔的谎言

translation.en: but I do believe that he saw the power that you and Martin had,
translation.zh:
但我坚信
他的确意识到你和马丁的影响力

translation.en: and it threatened him.
translation.zh: 这种影响力足以威胁他的地位

translation.en: Threatens 'em all.
translation.zh: 威胁他们所有人的地位

translation.en: But this… this country
translation.zh: 但这个国家

translation.en: has failed us over and over again.
translation.zh: 一而再 再而三地令我们失望

translation.en: And even so, each day, we forgive by fighting to make things right.
translation.zh:
即便如此 我们天天通过抗议行为
原谅这个国家

translation.en: And yet you can't forgive Martin for failing you that one time?
translation.zh:
马丁只令你失望过一次
你却无法原谅他？

translation.en: This new generation is restless and… and angry.
translation.zh: 新一代充满不安和愤怒

translation.en: You want that anger to turn to blood?
translation.zh: 你希望这股愤怒转化成暴力吗？

translation.en: Our children's blood?
translation.zh: 流的是年轻人的血

translation.en: Or will you harness it with Martin for our freedom?
translation.zh:
还是你愿意跟马丁一起控制局势
为我们同胞争取自由？

translation.en: You go.
translation.zh: 去吧

translation.en: You go get your friend back.
translation.zh: 去把你的朋友叫回来

translation.en: [radio announcer] That 1510 spot way down south here in Dixie.
translation.zh: 你们在美国南方收听1510频道

translation.en: John R., WLAC soul center, Nashville, Tennessee,
translation.zh:
我是约翰·R
这是在田纳西州纳什维尔 你在收听由人寿保险公司
呈现的WLAC爵士广播频道

translation.en: the broadcasting service of Life and Casualty Insurance Company.
translation.zh:
你在收听由人寿保险公司
呈现的WLAC爵士广播频道

translation.en: Don't touch that nigger.
translation.zh: 别碰到那个黑人

translation.en: Get on back now.
translation.zh: 马上下车

translation.en: If I move, this child will never know that an injustice is taking place.
translation.zh:
如果我下车的话
这孩子就永远不知道何谓不公不义

translation.en: -I'm not resisting. -[grunting]
translation.zh: 我没有拒捕的意思

translation.en: I'm not-- [straining]
translation.zh: 我没有…

translation.en: -I'm-- [grunts] -[body thuds]
translation.zh: 我…

translation.en: -Bayard. Oh my word! -Coretta.
translation.zh:
-贝亚德 天啊！
-科丽塔

translation.en: -As I live and breathe! -[laughing]
translation.zh: 真的是你啊！

translation.en: -When did you get into town? -Oh, within the hour.
translation.zh:
-你什么时候进城的？
-一个小时前

translation.en: Oh, look at you.
translation.zh: 瞧瞧你

translation.en: -No, look at you. -Oh, you must stay for dinner.
translation.zh:
-不是 瞧瞧你
-你必须留下来吃晚餐

translation.en: Oh, you better ask the master of the house.
translation.zh: 最好先问过一家之主吧

translation.en: Oh, hush. You can't be a master without slaves,
translation.zh: 少来了 没有仆人 哪有主人？

translation.en: and in this house, there are neither. [chuckles]
translation.zh:
况且在这个家里
没有仆人 也没有主人

translation.en: Oh, you must see the children.
translation.zh: 你一定要去看看孩子们

translation.en: I did it! Look, I did it!
translation.zh: 我做到了 你们看

translation.en: -[girl] Shut up. -So, Madam Coloratura.
translation.zh:
-闭嘴
-话说你可是歌后啊

translation.en: Carnegie Hall?
translation.zh: 想过在卡内基音乐厅表演吗？

translation.en: -I know some folks who know some folks. -You haven't been here ten minutes.
translation.zh:
-我有门路
-你进门还不到十分钟呢

translation.en: ♪ This little light of mine ♪
translation.zh: 我心中的一盏小小明灯

translation.en: ♪ I'm gonna let it shine ♪
translation.zh: 我要让它绽放光芒

translation.en: ♪ This little light of mine ♪
translation.zh: 我心中的一盏小小明灯

translation.en: ♪ I'm gonna let it shine ♪
translation.zh: 我要让它绽放光芒

translation.en: ♪ This little light of mine ♪
translation.zh: 我心中的一盏小小明灯

translation.en: ♪ I'm gonna let it shine ♪
translation.zh: 我要让它绽放光芒

translation.en: ♪ Let it shine ♪
translation.zh: 绽放光芒

translation.en: ♪ Let it shine ♪
translation.zh: 绽放光芒

translation.en: ♪ Let it shine ♪
translation.zh: 绽放光芒

translation.en: All right. All right.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: -♪ Everywhere I go ♪ -♪ Go ♪
translation.zh:
-无论我走到哪里
-走到哪里

translation.en: -♪ I'm gonna let it shine ♪ -Oh!
translation.zh: 我都要让它绽放光芒

translation.en: ♪ Everywhere I go ♪
translation.zh: 无论我走到哪里

translation.en: Good. Good.
translation.zh: 我都要让它绽放光芒

translation.en: ♪ I'm gonna let it shine ♪
translation.zh: 我要让它绽放光芒

translation.en: Your microphone. Here you go.
translation.zh: 这是你的麦克风 尽情唱吧

translation.en: ♪ Everywhere I go ♪
translation.zh: 无论我走到哪里

translation.en: ♪ I'm gonna let it shine ♪
translation.zh: 我都要让它绽放光芒

translation.en: ♪ Let it shine, let it shine, let it shine ♪
translation.zh: 绽放光芒

translation.en: -Well, all right. Come on. -[solo] ♪ Jesus is the light ♪
translation.zh:
-很好 来吧
-耶稣就是光

translation.en: ♪ Jesus is the light ♪
translation.zh: 耶稣就是光

translation.en: ♪ I'm gonna let it shine ♪
translation.zh: 我要让它绽放光芒

translation.en: -♪ Jesus is the light ♪ -[clapping]
translation.zh: 耶稣就是光

translation.en: ♪ I'm gonna let it shine ♪
translation.zh: 我要让它绽放光芒

translation.en: -[Bayard] Yes! -[Coretta] Come on, Bernice.
translation.zh:
-很好
-唱啊 伯妮丝

translation.en: ♪ Jesus is the light ♪
translation.zh: 耶稣就是光

translation.en: -[Coretta] Thank you. -♪ I'm gonna let it shine ♪
translation.zh: 谢谢 我要让它绽放光芒

translation.en: ♪ Let it shine, let it shine ♪
translation.zh: 绽放光芒

translation.en: ♪ Let it shine, let it shine ♪
translation.zh: 绽放光芒

translation.en: -♪ Let it shine, let it shine ♪ -[Bayard] Fortissimo! Which means loud!
translation.zh: 唱大声点

translation.en: ♪ Let it shine ♪
translation.zh: 绽放光芒

translation.en: -Bravo! -[clapping]
translation.zh: 唱得好！

translation.en: -Bravo, Uncle Bayard! -Yeah, Uncle Bayard!
translation.zh:
-贝亚德叔叔 唱得好！
-好耶 贝亚德叔叔！

translation.en: So… Brother Medgar.
translation.zh: 话说梅德加弟兄…

translation.en: Unspeakable.
translation.zh: 一言难尽

translation.en: What did you make of Kennedy's speech?
translation.zh: 你对肯尼迪的演说有什么看法？

translation.en: Calculated, cautious.
translation.zh: 字字珠玑 小心翼翼

translation.en: Hours later, Medgar gets shot.
translation.zh: 几个小时后 梅德加就遭到枪击了

translation.en: So your march is… ambitious.
translation.zh: 你倡议的示威游行

translation.en: Unless we demonstrate strength in unity, Kennedy will do what they've always done,
translation.zh:
除非我们团结一致地展现影响力
肯尼迪是不会推行改革的

translation.en: champion legislation that's destined to fail.
translation.zh: 提出立法议案 一定会以失败收场

translation.en: This was not an easy journey for me.
translation.zh: 这条路我步步维艰

translation.en: But… the promise of what this march could become,
translation.zh:
但是 这场示威游行
能带来积极的成果

translation.en: the monumental impact it could have, the lives it could radically alter.
translation.zh:
能带来深厚的影响力
能大大改变数之不尽的生命

translation.en: -[laughing] -The dreams, the visions, and unfulfilled aspirations of our ancestors--
translation.zh:
实现我们先祖的梦想
愿景和未曾成真的愿望

translation.en: First time we met… [laughs]
translation.zh: 我们第一次见面后

translation.en: …I remember calling Corrie
translation.zh: 我记得我打给科丽塔

translation.en: and saying that this Rustin fella's a little crazy in the head.
translation.zh: 说这个叫鲁斯汀的家伙有点疯疯癫癫

translation.en: Only later did I fully comprehend
translation.zh: 到后来 我才完全理解

translation.en: that "a little" didn't even come close.
translation.zh: 你何止“有点”疯疯癫癫

translation.en: I missed you, friend.
translation.zh: 朋友 我想你了

translation.en: And I you.
translation.zh: 我也是

translation.en: Come fall, the Dixiecrats will get to work gutting Kennedy's bill, which leaves us--
translation.zh:
秋季来临时 州权民主党将极力阻止
肯尼迪提出立法议案 那我们…

translation.en: Two months to organize the largest peaceful protest ever
translation.zh:
用两个月策划一场
史上规模最庞大的和平示威运动

translation.en: and absolutely no time for anything else.
translation.zh: 我们没时间处理别的事了

translation.en: Such as?
translation.zh: 比方？

translation.en: Succumbing to blackmail, innuendo, and lies,
translation.zh: 屈服于勒索、性射影和假消息

translation.en: which are sure to follow if and when the march is announced.
translation.zh:
一旦游行示威运动的消息传出后
这些事一定会发生

translation.en: What about things that are true about you?
translation.zh: 那关于你的真相要怎么处理呢？

translation.en: What you see, I cannot conceal.
translation.zh: 你所看到的 我都无法隐瞒

translation.en: But… I swear to you,
translation.zh: 但我可以向你保证

translation.en: there will be no…
translation.zh: 绝对不会…

translation.en: incidents.
translation.zh: 节外生枝

translation.en: So an epic demonstration in our nation's capital,
translation.zh: 也就是说 一场史诗性的示威运动

translation.en: organized in eight to ten weeks
translation.zh: 将在八到十个月后 于美国首都上演

translation.en: without the help of the NAACP.
translation.zh:
整个过程没有得到
全国有色人种协进会支持

translation.en: Sounds like a hell of a good time.
translation.zh: 听你这么说来 应该很有意思

translation.en: You once said,
translation.zh: 你说过一句话

translation.en: "The time is always right
translation.zh: “只要是做对的事

translation.en: to do right."
translation.zh: 任何时机都是好时机”

translation.en: We're calling for a nonviolent,
translation.zh: 我们召集民众来到华盛顿

translation.en: peaceful march on Washington.
translation.zh: 参与一场非暴力的和平示威游行

translation.en: Yes!
translation.zh: 太好了！

translation.en: We intend to go there not by the hundreds or by the thousands,
translation.zh: 我的目标不是几百人或几千人

translation.en: but by the hundreds of thousands.
translation.zh: 而是十万人

translation.en: [Elias] Now that Dr. King has publicly endorsed the march,
translation.zh: 如今金博士公开支持这场游行了

translation.en: Mr. Wilkins can't attack it.
translation.zh: 威尔金斯先生无力反击

translation.en: So he's coming after you.
translation.zh: 只好冲着你来

translation.en: [man shouts] Brother Rustin!
translation.zh: 鲁斯汀弟兄！

translation.en: -Cleve! What are you doing here? -[laughing]
translation.zh: 克利夫 你怎么来了？

translation.en: When I heard about Roy's little coup de tête-à-tête,
translation.zh: 听说罗伊突然召集两派开会

translation.en: I decided to come and provide support, moral and otherwise.
translation.zh: 我决定出席 给予你精神上的支持

translation.en: Norm, Tom,
translation.zh: 诺姆、汤姆

translation.en: meet the indomitable Cleve Robinson, union leader of District 65.
translation.zh:
介绍一下 他是克利夫·罗宾森
第65区的工会领袖

translation.en: And newly appointed chairman of the march's administrative committee.
translation.zh: 兼刚上任的游行行政委员会主席

translation.en: And our first donor.
translation.zh: 也是游行的第一位赞助人

translation.en: You'd think they've never seen proud Black men before.
translation.zh: 有些人没见过抬头挺胸的黑人

translation.en: "Glorious shall be the battle when the time comes to fight for our people and our race!"
translation.zh: “为同胞和民族而战 是何等光荣”

translation.en: Black gents, and Tom, shall we?
translation.zh: 各位非裔男士、汤姆 要进去了吗？

translation.en: I realize a total budget of $65,000 may seem like a lot--
translation.zh: 我认为六万五千美元的预算虽然高…

translation.en: Chief, there's a rumor going around that you're planning on holding the march this summer?
translation.zh:
头儿 谣传你打算在今年夏季
举办这场游行 对吗？

translation.en: -Way too soon. -While the horror of Birmingham is fresh--
translation.zh:
-这也太快了吧
-伯明翰惨剧仍历历在目…

translation.en: -Bayard assured me the time-- -Let the man speak!
translation.zh:
-贝亚德向我保证到时…
-让他把话说完！

translation.en: We've got to seize the moment. The time is now.
translation.zh:
我们必须把握时机
现在就是最好的时机

translation.en: -Bayard, if I might. -Do you understand--
translation.zh:
-贝亚德 请容我打岔一下
-你懂不懂…

translation.en: [Martin decisively] Bayard!
translation.zh: 贝亚德！

translation.en: Martin.
translation.zh: 马丁 你说吧

translation.en: We all heard the president announce on national television
translation.zh: 我们都在国家电视台上看到

translation.en: that he intends to send a bill to Congress.
translation.zh: 总统宣布他有意向国会提呈法案

translation.en: It is my personal estimation that in order to get the bill
translation.zh:
我个人认为 要确保法案绕过
南方种族隔离主义者的反对声浪

translation.en: past Southern segregationists will take a president of intelligence,
translation.zh:
要确保法案绕过
南方种族隔离主义者的反对声浪 需要一位聪明睿智

translation.en: political savvy, and the passion.
translation.zh: 有政治头脑和热忱的总统

translation.en: Kennedy has the first two in abundance but not the third.
translation.zh:
肯尼迪有智慧 有政治头脑
唯独欠缺热忱

translation.en: Not when it comes to civil rights.
translation.zh: 尤其在民权抗争方面

translation.en: So to ensure he does not relent,
translation.zh: 为了确保他持续抗争下去

translation.en: we must not relent in our commitment to the country and to the race.
translation.zh:
我们必须持续实践
对国家和民族的承诺

translation.en: And that is the reason for the timely nature
translation.zh: 也因此 这场抗争虽然极其困难

translation.en: of this most improbable yet most essential endeavor.
translation.zh: 却也极其关键 所以要趁热打铁

translation.en: -I couldn't have said it better-- -Who are all these people?
translation.zh:
-说得太好了
-这些人是谁？

translation.en: You, you, you, you, stay.
translation.zh: 你们几个人留下

translation.en: Everyone else, out.
translation.zh: 其余的人滚蛋

translation.en: I am chairman of the administrative committee
translation.zh: 我是这场游行的行政委员会主席

translation.en: and, to date, the march's only donor.
translation.zh: 也是至目前为止唯一的赞助人

translation.en: Much appreciated. Out!
translation.zh: 万分感激 滚

translation.en: Go on. Write yourselves out of history.
translation.zh: 去吧 去为自己编写史册

translation.en: -[Bayard] Come on. -I'd be happier doing it without you.
translation.zh:
-走吧
-少了你参与也无所谓

translation.en: You showboating, bloodsucking sons of whores!
translation.zh: 你这自以为是、坐享其成的狗杂种！

translation.en: -Gonna throw me out? -Cleve!
translation.zh:
-竟敢叫我滚？
-克利夫！

translation.en: -Go and suck your mother! -Oh, Cleve. Cleve.
translation.zh:
-去你妈的！
-天啊 克利夫

translation.en: You do realize what's happening right this second?
translation.zh:
你到底有没有意识到
现在是什么情况？

translation.en: My guess is Roy is starting to build his case against me.
translation.zh: 我看罗伊要开始收集证据控诉我

translation.en: We must ask ourselves,
translation.zh: 我们必须扪心自问

translation.en: is this the man we wish to see labeled Mr. March-on-Washington?
translation.zh:
我们真希望看到
这个人成为华盛顿游行的面孔吗？

translation.en: [Bayard] John Lewis and the chief will defend me. [Roy] He was in the Young Communist League.
translation.zh:
-约翰·刘易斯和大哥一定站我这边
-他曾经是青年共产主义联盟

translation.en: Which he renounced years ago.
translation.zh: 他很多年前已经退出了

translation.en: -Imprisoned for refusing the draft. -A moral decision, not a cowardly one.
translation.zh:
-因拒绝入伍而坐牢
-这是出于道义考量 而非儒弱

translation.en: Even so, Roy will press on.
translation.zh: 即便如此 罗伊还是会咄咄逼人

translation.en: His mannerisms and reputation make him an easy target.
translation.zh:
他的言行举止和名声
将使他成为容易被抨击的对象

translation.en: And when the white press and the powers that be take aim,
translation.zh: 一旦白人媒体和当权者发动攻势时

translation.en: and they will,
translation.zh: 他们一定会的

translation.en: every person seated at this table
translation.zh: 在座各位

translation.en: will be in the line of fire because of him.
translation.zh: 都会因为他而被推到风口浪尖上

translation.en: Chief?
translation.zh: 头儿 你怎么说？

translation.en: What date is strategically wise for a march?
translation.zh: 哪天举办游行比较有利？

translation.en: -We'll need at least eight weeks. -Monday, August 26th.
translation.zh:
-起码需要八周来筹备
-8月26日 周一

translation.en: Mondays are challenging for Protestants, Fridays complicated for Jewish friends.
translation.zh:
周一基督新教徒可能不行
周五犹太教徒可能来不成

translation.en: Sorry, sir, but what happened in there?
translation.zh: 打岔一下 刚刚里面是什么情况？

translation.en: -They voted to remove Bayard as director. -Son of a bitch.
translation.zh:
他们投票决定革除贝亚德的指挥一职 -狗娘养的
-我的首要任务

translation.en: My first order of business
translation.zh:
-狗娘养的
-我的首要任务

translation.en: was to reappoint him as my deputy director,
translation.zh: 则是重新委任他为我的副指挥

translation.en: -putting him fully in charge. -[all laughing]
translation.zh: 让他全权主导这场游行

translation.en: You can call me trash collector for all I care.
translation.zh:
你给我“环卫工人”这个职衔
我也不会反对

translation.en: You are one very clever Black man.
translation.zh: 你真是个聪明绝顶的黑人啊

translation.en: [softly] Get to work, my friend.
translation.zh: 赶紧去忙吧 朋友

translation.en: Come on. Come on. Come on.
translation.zh: 快点

translation.en: Lights.
translation.zh: 开灯

translation.en: Our new offices!
translation.zh: 这是我们新的办事处！

translation.en: The third floor's uninhabitable, so we'll be all on top of each other down here.
translation.zh:
三楼不宜住人
所以我们将会通通挤在这一层楼

translation.en: Ugh, dirty.
translation.zh: 好脏啊

translation.en: There you go.
translation.zh: 麻烦清理干净

translation.en: Over here.
translation.zh: 看这里

translation.en: -Our boardroom. -[woman] Our boardroom?
translation.zh:
-这是我们的会议室
-会议室？

translation.en: Rachelle, you'll be in charge of transportation.
translation.zh: 瑞秋 你负责处理交通

translation.en: For 100,000 people? I can't even drive.
translation.zh: 处理十万人的交通？我连开车都不会

translation.en: Norm, you'll travel from city to city raising funds and spreading the word.
translation.zh:
诺姆 你要走遍所有城市
筹集资金 传播消息

translation.en: Well, what's my budget?
translation.zh: 我的预算是多少？

translation.en: This'll get you to your first city where you'll raise funds to get you to the next.
translation.zh:
这张钞票将送你到第一座城市
你去那边筹集前往下一座城市的钱

translation.en: My office.
translation.zh: 这是我的办公室

translation.en: Near the stairs and the front door? Is that wise?
translation.zh: 靠近楼梯和大门？这样合适吗？

translation.en: I'd like to welcome a woman who needs no introduction.
translation.zh:
欢迎这位女士来到办事处
不用多介绍

translation.en: Dr. Anna Hedgeman.
translation.zh: 安娜·赫尔克曼博士

translation.en: Dr. Hedgeman has volunteered
translation.zh: 赫尔克曼博士主动请缨

translation.en: to lead outreach to all religious organizations.
translation.zh: 协助将消息传达给所有宗教组织

translation.en: Tom, Eleanore.
translation.zh: 汤姆、埃莉诺

translation.en: -You'll oversee all written documents. -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-你们负责监管所有书面文件
-好的

translation.en: First up, an invite to a July 2nd meeting
translation.zh: 你们第一项任务 就是写信邀请

translation.en: with the leaders of the Big Six civil rights organizations. -[Anna] Oh. -[clamoring]
translation.zh:
六大民权组织的领导人
出席7月2日举办的会议

translation.en: All those big oversized hats for those big oversized heads.
translation.zh:
尽是自以为是的组织
加上自以为是的领导人

translation.en: -[woman laughs] -We need their numbers and resources.
translation.zh: 我们需要他们报上人数和提供资源

translation.en: -Courtney? -Yes, sir.
translation.zh:
-考特尼
-是 头儿

translation.en: You'll come with me to DC.
translation.zh: 陪我走一趟华府

translation.en: -Tom? -Yup.
translation.zh:
-汤姆
-是

translation.en: Instead of finding a place in the city, you're gonna stay in my spare room.
translation.zh:
你不用在城里找租房了
住进我家的空房吧

translation.en: -Keep me focused and out of trouble. -We tried this, and it doesn't work.
translation.zh:
-帮助我专注工作 远离事端
-我们试过了 没用

translation.en: Everyone!
translation.zh: 各位

translation.en: By the time I get back from DC tomorrow night,
translation.zh: 明晚我从华盛顿回来后

translation.en: this dump needs to be operational.
translation.zh: 这个鬼地方必须已经变成了行动中心

translation.en: [Bayard] One can't help but be in awe.
translation.zh: 这种庄严肃穆的氛围令人深深震撼

translation.en: Makes you wanna believe.
translation.zh: 令人充满希望

translation.en: Bayard Rustin, deputy director of the March on Washington
translation.zh:
我是贝亚德·鲁斯汀
“向华盛顿进军”的副指挥

translation.en: for Jobs and Freedom. Chief Wells.
translation.zh:
-目的是争取就业和自由
-我是威尔斯局长

translation.en: Mr. Caldwell, Deputies Walden, Cowell, and Barnes.
translation.zh:
这位考德威尔先生
还有瓦尔登、考威尔和巴恩斯副局长

translation.en: -Who's with the National Park Service? -No one.
translation.zh:
-国家公园管理局是哪位的管辖区？
-不是我们的管辖区

translation.en: If I'm not mistaken, the mall falls under NPS jurisdiction.
translation.zh:
如果我没搞错的话
国家广场归国家公园管理局管理

translation.en: Correct.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: Chief Wells, in little under seven weeks' time,
translation.zh: 威尔斯局长 在短短七周后

translation.en: a monumental, two-day event is--
translation.zh: 一场连续两天的历史性将…

translation.en: One day. It's no longer a two-day event.
translation.zh: 是一天 不再是两天了

translation.en: According to whom?
translation.zh: 谁说的？

translation.en: Mr. Wilkins of the NAACP also believes it should be one day.
translation.zh: 全国有色人种协进会的威尔金斯先生

translation.en: I'd be safe in assuming you do not work for Mr. Wilkins.
translation.zh:
我敢相信
你不是听命于威尔金斯先生的吧？

translation.en: No, I do not.
translation.zh: 没错 我不是

translation.en: [chuckles] Well, neither do I,
translation.zh: 我也不是

translation.en: so I'm confused as to why you even mentioned his name.
translation.zh:
所以我才想不通
你刚刚为什么提起他的名字

translation.en: Mr. Rustin--
translation.zh: 鲁斯汀先生…

translation.en: I am, however, very interested in knowing who you do work for.
translation.zh: 我倒是很想知道你听命于谁

translation.en: Mr. Rustin, we find what works best is for you to answer our questions, not the reverse.
translation.zh:
我们认为你只要回答我们的问题
没必要提问 这样才能有效沟通

translation.en: And I found a free-flowing exchange of information and ideas works even better.
translation.zh:
我认为互相交换情报和想法
才是更有效的共同方式

translation.en: Well, when you put on an event in your mall, we'll give that a go,
translation.zh:
如果你有意在你们的广场举办活动
我们不会反对

translation.en: but seeing as it's your gathering in our mall--
translation.zh: 但如果你想在我们的广场举办集会…

translation.en: Your mall? Not the National Mall or America's Front Yard--
translation.zh:
你们的广场？这不是国家广场吗？
不是美国前院吗？

translation.en: -Since you insist on raising your voice-- -I have not raised my voice--
translation.zh:
-如果你继续提高声量…
-我没提高声量

translation.en: You're more invested in constructing roadblocks instead of finding solutions--
translation.zh:
比起寻找解决方案
你们更热衷于设置路障

translation.en: The person I needed to communicate with didn't even bother to show up.
translation.zh: 我需要沟通的对象不屑来见我

translation.en: I fail to see how we can support your gathering. Gentlemen.
translation.zh:
先生 我无法理解
我们为什么要支持这场集会

translation.en: Where are you going?
translation.zh: 你们去哪里啊？

translation.en: Sir, sir! It is not a gathering. It is an act of civil disobedience,
translation.zh:
警官 这不是一场普通的集会
而是一场公民抗命行动

translation.en: sanctioned by some of the most meaningful minds in the country.
translation.zh: 获国内好些高级知识分子支持

translation.en: And it is going to take place over two days!
translation.zh: 而且将连办两天！

translation.en: [announcer] …departing from Union Station for Boston…
translation.zh: 从联合车站往波士顿行进…

translation.en: I tell you, Martin, not since Tennessee,
translation.zh: 马丁 听好 自上次在田纳西州

translation.en: when those two policemen set out to reconfigure my face,
translation.zh: 遭到两位警员暴打毁容后

translation.en: have I experienced such an overt display of disregard.
translation.zh: 这是我第二次被如此公然羞辱

translation.en: They had one goal, to make sure the meeting was a resounding failure.
translation.zh:
他们只有一个目的
确保那场集会一败涂地

translation.en: [Martin] You say he mentioned Roy.
translation.zh: 你说他提到罗伊

translation.en: Yeah, but it was clear this was coming from someplace higher up.
translation.zh: 没错 但显然是上头的命令

translation.en: [Martin] President Kennedy and his attorney general brother higher up?
translation.zh:
上头是指肯尼迪总统
和他那担任检察官的弟弟？

translation.en: Or Hoover and the FBI?
translation.zh: 还是联邦调查局局长胡佛？

translation.en: All of the above.
translation.zh: 以上皆是

translation.en: [Coretta] Martin?
translation.zh: 马丁？

translation.en: Corrie's calling me to dinner.
translation.zh: 科丽塔叫我吃晚餐了

translation.en: We'll speak tomorrow.
translation.zh: 我们明天再聊

translation.en: Give her a hug.
translation.zh: 替我问候她

translation.en: Hello.
translation.zh: 喂？

translation.en: Hello?
translation.zh: 喂？

translation.en: Oh sorry.
translation.zh: 对不起

translation.en: -Sorry. -Come on.
translation.zh:
-对不起
-搞什么？

translation.en: You alone?
translation.zh: 你一个人吗？

translation.en: -Never, when Mahalia's around. [chuckles] -[music stops]
translation.zh:
有马哈丽亚的歌声陪伴
怎么会是一个人呢？

translation.en: Drink?
translation.zh: 喝酒吗？

translation.en: Uh, no, I should probably go to sleep. -Oh no.
translation.zh:
-不了 我还是去睡吧
-别走

translation.en: I made you one anyway.
translation.zh: 我已经给你倒一杯了

translation.en: Bayard…
translation.zh: 贝亚德

translation.en: Good night.
translation.zh: 晚安

translation.en: -[woman] Yes, this is Michelle Harwood. -Yes. Yes, this is Michelle Harwood
translation.zh: 对 我是米歇尔·哈伍德 对 我是米歇尔·哈伍德

translation.en: March on Washington, Michelle Harwood. How may I help you?
translation.zh:
我是米歇尔·哈伍德
这是“向华盛顿进军”行动室 有什么可以帮到你吗？

translation.en: [woman 2] Yes. Yes, this is Michelle Harwood.
translation.zh: 对 我是米歇尔·哈伍德

translation.en: -[woman] Louisville 50? -[phone ringing]
translation.zh: 路易维尔 50人？

translation.en: -[woman 3] Michelle Harwood speaking. -Who is Michelle Harwood?
translation.zh:
-我是米歇尔·哈伍德
-谁是米歇尔·哈伍德？

translation.en: Anyone involved in travel is Michelle Harwood.
translation.zh: 负责交通的人都叫米歇尔·哈伍德

translation.en: Keeps it simple when they call back. It was Bayard's idea.
translation.zh:
这样能避免对方回电时被搞糊涂了
这是贝亚德出的主意

translation.en: [woman 4] Yes, this is Michelle Harwood.
translation.zh: 对 我是米歇尔·哈伍德

translation.en: [Lewis] The president kept talking, mostly about himself.
translation.zh: 总统很多意见 但都离不开自己

translation.en: How if anything goes wrong at the march, it's gonna kill his bill.
translation.zh:
万一游行出了什么差错
他提呈的议案就不保了

translation.en: And why protest at the White House, especially after his speech and his bill?
translation.zh:
为什么偏要在白宫示威？
特别是在他发表演说和提呈法案后

translation.en: What was Roy's response?
translation.zh: 罗伊怎么回应？

translation.en: He nodded mostly.
translation.zh: 大多数时候都在点头

translation.en: -Whitney and Jim? -Watching Martin, who was listening.
translation.zh:
-惠特尼和吉姆呢？
-他们看着正在聆听的马丁

translation.en: -[inhales] Then the president's brother-- -The attorney general was there?
translation.zh:
-接着总统的胞弟…
-检察长也在场？

translation.en: Kept saying we should cancel, call the whole thing off.
translation.zh: 一直劝说我们喊停 取消整个运动

translation.en: And this took place in the Oval Office?
translation.zh: 这段对话发生在总统办公室里？

translation.en: Three days ago.
translation.zh: 三天前

translation.en: Now, I received a very distressing letter from Senator Douglas.
translation.zh:
我收到了道格拉斯参议员的来信
内容十分令人担忧

translation.en: I received one as well, from Senator Humphrey.
translation.zh: 我也收到汉弗莱参议员的来信

translation.en: So did I, Senator Hart.
translation.zh: 我也收到哈特参议员的来信

translation.en: -Regarding? -Latrines.
translation.zh:
-问什么？
-公厕

translation.en: -Isn't Park Services helping us out? -No, they are not.
translation.zh:
-公园管理局不帮忙吗？
-是的 没错

translation.en: Which is why I'm proposing the march from a coalition with the unions.
translation.zh:
所以我才提议
跟几家工会联办这场游行

translation.en: The AFL-CIO, the UAW--
translation.zh:
美国劳工和产业联合工会
美国汽车工会

translation.en: Both of whom are against a two-day event--
translation.zh: 这两家工会都反对连续两天示威…

translation.en: You're on the AFL council.
translation.zh: 你负责联系美国劳联吧？

translation.en: Well, I'm not sure about Meany, but Reuther does, in fact,
translation.zh: 我还不清楚米尼的想法 但路特的确更倾向于游行一天

translation.en: favor a one-day march and no White House event.
translation.zh: 但路特的确更倾向于游行一天

translation.en: Exactly what I said.
translation.zh:
-也反对在白宫集会
-很好

translation.en: We need to limit this to one day and take the White House off the table.
translation.zh:
我们必须把活动缩短成一天
然后取消白宫集会

translation.en: You try to get me fired. Now you wanna see the march destroyed.
translation.zh:
早前你企图让我被开除
现在又希望看到游行失败

translation.en: Do you think I just woke up one day and said to myself,
translation.zh: 我没有某天一觉醒来对自己说

translation.en: "Let's stage the largest march ever
translation.zh: “来策划一场史上最大型的游行

translation.en: and get former communist Quaker Bayard Rustin to pull it all together?"
translation.zh:
并让前贵格会阿共
贝亚德·鲁斯汀一手操办” 对吧？

translation.en: No, I did not.
translation.zh: 我绝对没这么做

translation.en: But once we signed on, we're in it no matter what.
translation.zh:
但既然我们已经说好了
游行无论如何都要办成

translation.en: If you would just accept the inevitable now,
translation.zh: 如果你能马上接受既定的现实

translation.en: instead of later when economics force you to,
translation.zh:
而非等到面对财务问题后
才不得已这么做

translation.en: it would give the appearance of strength and unity.
translation.zh:
那外人还是会认为
我们有影响力、一体同心

translation.en: It's called being strategic.
translation.zh: 这叫深谋远虑

translation.en: I know this may feel like an attenuation of everything that we fought for--
translation.zh:
我知道这种情况可能会让我们觉得
所有努力都被削弱…

translation.en: Because that's exactly what it is.
translation.zh: 但事实正是如此啊

translation.en: A two-day event will make it clear that we will not back down or back away.
translation.zh:
两天的活动才能让政府意识到
我们绝不退缩 绝不退避

translation.en: -If you allow Roy this one-- -Absolutely not.
translation.zh:
-如果你退一步 让罗伊…
-绝对不行

translation.en: Bayard, you have Chief, you have me, Dr. Hedgeman, and Jim.
translation.zh:
贝亚德 我、头儿
赫尔克曼博士和吉姆都站你这边

translation.en: An uneasy alliance, but an alliance nonetheless.
translation.zh:
虽然相处起来不容易
但终究站在同一阵线上

translation.en: And if I'm not asking attendees to get arrested at the White House
translation.zh:
如果出席者
不会因为参与白宫集会而被逮捕

translation.en: or, heaven forbid, sleep in tents, I could get more congregations to sign on.
translation.zh:
或是不需要住帐篷过夜
那我就能说服更多教会参与

translation.en: -So no lobbying Congress? -Or marching on the White House?
translation.zh:
-所以不用找国会议员游说了？
-也不用游行到白宫了？

translation.en: -Or tents on the Mall? -Turning into a goddamn picnic.
translation.zh:
-也不用在广场搭建帐篷了？
-简直成了大型野餐会

translation.en: That first day, sharing ideas, writing them on the wall…
translation.zh:
开会第一天 我们集思广益
把想法写在墙上…

translation.en: Bayard, you have to understand our disappointment.
translation.zh: 你知道我们有多么失望吗？

translation.en: Do I want this? No.
translation.zh: 这是我想要的结果吗？不是

translation.en: But if we wanna make sure 100,000 people show up, we need help.
translation.zh:
但如果要确保有十万人出席
我们需要借助他人

translation.en: And in order to get the unions and their money, changes have to be made.
translation.zh:
而要得到工会的支持和金援
我们必须做出一些改变

translation.en: If Sisters Dorie and Joyce went out to Westchester
translation.zh:
如果朵莉和乔伊丝姐妹
愿意前往韦斯特切斯特县

translation.en: or the Upper East Side,
translation.zh: 或是纽约上东区

translation.en: I know you'd come back with not only enough money for one bus but three.
translation.zh:
相信你们一定能筹到
支付不是一辆 而是三辆公车的车费

translation.en: Same with you Eleanore, Tom, Charlene.
translation.zh: 你们也是 埃莉诺、汤姆、夏琳

translation.en: We are committed to the cause
translation.zh: 我们均致力于

translation.en: of altering the trajectory of this country towards freedom.
translation.zh:
改变国家的发展方向
往自由的国度前进

translation.en: That's what's on the line.
translation.zh: 这才是重点

translation.en: Nothing less.
translation.zh: 其他都不重要

translation.en: I'd like to share what it was like growing up in Hattiesburg.
translation.zh:
我想跟大家分享
在哈蒂斯堡长大是什么情况

translation.en: As a young girl in Mississippi…
translation.zh: 作为生活在密西西比州的少女…

translation.en: Regardless of how smart you were…
translation.zh: 无论我们有多聪明…

translation.en: …and never miss Sunday school.
translation.zh: …从没错过主日学

translation.en: …you were told that your dreams were never gonna happen.
translation.zh:
…人们都会说
我们的梦想永远不可能实现

translation.en: -Because of what you looked like. -Because of the color of your skin.
translation.zh:
-只因为我们的外形
-只因为我们的肤色

translation.en: We got another bus!
translation.zh: 我们又弄到一辆公车了！

translation.en: As long as Negro workers are ill-housed and underpaid,
translation.zh:
只要非裔工人的居住条件没获得改善
工资低廉

translation.en: then the fate of all workers will be at peril.
translation.zh: 那所有工人的权益都会受到威胁

translation.en: My father was president of Transportation Workers Local 101.
translation.zh: 我爸是101区公交工会的主席

translation.en: -Brooklyn! -[all] Brooklyn!
translation.zh:
-布鲁克林！
-布鲁克林！

translation.en: [Cleve] Get your March on Washington buttons!
translation.zh: 来买“向华盛顿进军”的别针吧

translation.en: One quarter, brother. One quarter. One quarter-- Thank you!
translation.zh: 25美分 老兄 才25美分 谢谢

translation.en: For the emancipation of our race!
translation.zh: 解放我们同胞！

translation.en: One quarter. One quarter. Make sure you are there!
translation.zh: 25美分 一定要来！

translation.en: -Sister, one quarter. One quarter. -Mm-mm. Mm-mm. One quarter!
translation.zh: 姐妹 25美分 才25美分

translation.en: We just had the best idea ever.
translation.zh: 我们刚想到一个绝妙的点子

translation.en: Say yeah!
translation.zh: （全明星大型慈善秀）

translation.en: [crowd] Yeah! -Say yeah! -[crowd] Yeah!
translation.zh:
（1963年8月23日
向华盛顿进军 争取就业和自由）

translation.en: -[Tom] Five thousand! -[Eleanore] Five thousand dollars.
translation.zh:
-五千！
-五千美元！

translation.en: August 28th, Mahalia Jackson's gonna sing, and freedom's gonna shine.
translation.zh:
8月28日当天
马哈丽亚·杰克逊将登台献唱 自由将获得胜利！

translation.en: Freedom has never been free,
translation.zh: 自由是要付出代价的

translation.en: so we will continue to march, and we will fight and will not stop.
translation.zh:
所以我们会继续游行
继续争取 绝不放弃

translation.en: And the Lord wants you to know that you're loved.
translation.zh: 上帝要你们知道 你们是被爱的

translation.en: -Yes. Thank the Lord. -Yes.
translation.zh:
-说得好 感谢主
-说得好

translation.en: -[Elias] Now, he wraps you in his arms… -[all] Yes, he does.
translation.zh: 听好 祂把你们抱在怀中

translation.en: -…and your fears begin to fade. -[all] Yes!
translation.zh: 直到恐惧开始消退

translation.en: -Now, his touch… -Yes! …is his way of saying…
translation.zh: 听好 祂的抚慰意味着…

translation.en: -[woman] Praise to God! -…you're not alone.
translation.zh: 赞美主！ …你们并不孤单

translation.en: -[woman] You're not alone. -[man] Thank you!
translation.zh:
-并不孤单！
-感谢主！

translation.en: Now, where you once felt hopeless…
translation.zh: 听好 你们曾经感到绝望无奈

translation.en: [woman] Yes!
translation.zh: 是的！

translation.en: …you now feel strong.
translation.zh: 如今感到强大坚定

translation.en: -Where there was once doubt, ha… -[all] Yes!
translation.zh: 曾经满怀疑虑…

translation.en: -Amen! Praise the Lord! -…you now feel brave and alive.
translation.zh:
-阿门 赞美主！
-如今感到勇敢且充满生命力

translation.en: Because you know.
translation.zh: 因为你们知道！

translation.en: -[all] Amen! -[Elias] Oh, you know!
translation.zh:
-阿门！
-你们知道！

translation.en: You know! You know!
translation.zh: 你们知道！

translation.en: You know! You know
translation.zh: 你们知道！

translation.en: with all of your heart
translation.zh: 你们打从心底知道

translation.en: that you are a child of God.
translation.zh: 你们是上帝的子女

translation.en: That you have the right to love and be loved.
translation.zh: 你们有权益去爱和被爱

translation.en: -Yes! -Let the congregation say amen.
translation.zh:
-说得好！
-齐声说阿门

translation.en: [congregation] Amen!
translation.zh: 阿门！

translation.en: [Elias] Amen and amen and amen and amen and amen!
translation.zh: 阿门…

translation.en: -Tom! -Yeah?
translation.zh:
-汤姆！
-是

translation.en: On the desk, an invitation to the march Dr. Anna asked me to write.
translation.zh:
桌上有一份安娜博士
要我写的游行邀请函

translation.en: My spelling is atrocious.
translation.zh: 我经常写错字

translation.en: Also, have Officer Johnson from the New York Guardians come see me.
translation.zh:
也帮我联络纽约纠察队的约翰森警官
叫他来跟我见个面

translation.en: -[glass thuds] -And in addition to an FBI detail
translation.zh: 顺便提醒你 有一位联调局探员

translation.en: being parked out front, careful what you say on the phone.
translation.zh: 把车停在门外 讲电话时小心点

translation.en: I have a feeling the entire Kennedy clan is listening in.
translation.zh:
我总觉得
整个肯尼迪家族都在窃听我们说话

translation.en: [officer] Keep moving. Go. Everybody go.
translation.zh: 继续走 走啊
